item.title: DIY Dev-Containers
item.description: Why we use Dev-Containers What I want The Beginnings Docker In Docker Secrets Management Portability Wrapping it up Like most developers, I spend an inordinate amount of time dealing with my local installations and dependencies. When working on multiple projects, it is not uncommon to encounter conflicting versions of dependencies, and while virtual environments and package managers like Node Package Manager help to mitigate this issue, they often fall short.
